opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we make event times easily visible on the newcomers club website and app?
opportunities.evidence: It might be nice to have the time reflected easily so I don't have to open it first to see what time it is.
opportunities.user_need: Users need quick access to event times to plan their schedules effectively.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we highlight new events and updates more effectively on the website and app?
opportunities.evidence: It would be great to have both on the app and the website the new things are highlighted in some fashion maybe they're up at the top of the list.
opportunities.user_need: Users need to easily identify new events and updates without searching through the entire list.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we simplify the registration process for events?
opportunities.evidence: If I've never done a jot form... she had a lot of trouble with it.
opportunities.user_need: Users require a seamless and straightforward registration experience for events.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we streamline the waitlist and refund process for event cancellations?
opportunities.evidence: When you go to the waitlist then the person who cancels theoretically gets a refund... that was extremely time-consuming.
opportunities.user_need: Users need a more efficient system to handle waitlists and refunds during event cancellations.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we include event addresses in reminder emails?
opportunities.evidence: It would be nice to have the address in that reminder since it's only going to the people who are registered.
opportunities.user_need: Users need easy access to event addresses to avoid scrambling to find them.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we reduce email clutter for members of the newcomers club?
opportunities.evidence: My email is just swamp with Santa Barbara newcomers club so I cannot even know which one when I need to go back.
opportunities.user_need: Users need a more organized communication strategy to avoid overwhelming email notifications.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we offer more events during evenings and weekends?
opportunities.evidence: Please have more things on the weekends... if I get late it's not all mine.
opportunities.user_need: Users need more flexible event scheduling outside of standard working hours.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we ensure the accuracy of event registration information?
opportunities.evidence: The registration on the website was not correct... we almost sent this person who was lost to the wrong address.
opportunities.user_need: Users require reliable and up-to-date information regarding event registrations.
